# Public Assets

This directory contains:
- `model.onnx` - The trained AI image detection model (generated by running `scripts/train.py`)
- Extension icons

## Generating the Model

Run the training script to generate `model.onnx`:

```bash
C:\venv\undiff\Scripts\python.exe scripts/train.py
```

For quick testing with a subset of data:
```bash
C:\venv\undiff\Scripts\python.exe scripts/train.py --test
```
